alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN NASSAU... SOUTHWESTERN CAMDEN AND EAST CENTRAL CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Folkston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Folkston, Woodbine, Homeland, Kings Ferry, and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
